properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel out 20 NM; Bays and Waterways from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas; Bays and Waterways from Port Aransas to Port O'Connor; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 2:56PM CST until February 4 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds around 20 knots with gusts up to 30 knots
and seas 5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Bays and Waterways from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas,
Bays and Waterways from Port Aransas to Port O'Connor, Coastal
waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas out 20 NM and Coastal
waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From noon Monday to 6 AM CST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong to very strong winds and/or increased seas
will result in hazardous marine conditions especially for
inexperienced mariners with smaller vessels.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY
